scripts.local: concurrently "bun --env-file=.env.local run src/app/configs/Tsoa.ts" "nodemon --watch src --exec bun --env-file=.env.local run --max-old-space-size=512 src/main.ts" "nodemon --watch src -x tsoa spec-and-routes"
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun --env-file=.env.development run src/app/configs/Tsoa.ts" "nodemon --watch src --exec bun --env-file=.env.development run --max-old-space-size=512 src/main.ts" "nodemon --watch src -x tsoa spec-and-routes"
scripts.prod: concurrently "bun --env-file=.env.production run src/app/configs/Tsoa.ts" "nodemon --watch src --exec bun --env-file=.env.production run --max-old-space-size=512 src/main.ts" "nodemon --watch src -x tsoa spec-and-routes"
scripts.build:local: bun --env-file=.env.local run src/app/configs/Tsoa.ts && bun tsoa spec-and-routes && bun --env-file=.env.local build --max-old-space-size=512 src/main.ts --compile --minify --outfile build/app.bun --target bun
scripts.build:dev: bun --env-file=.env.development run src/app/configs/Tsoa.ts && bun tsoa spec-and-routes && bun --env-file=.env.development build --max-old-space-size=512 src/main.ts --compile --minify --outfile build/app.bun --target bun
scripts.build:prod: bun --env-file=.env.production run src/app/configs/Tsoa.ts && bun tsoa spec-and-routes && bun --env-file=.env.production build --max-old-space-size=512 src/main.ts --compile --minify --outfile build/app.bun --target bun
